holdsDescription: By checking this box you are ordering your climbing wall including climbing holds. Choose a colour variant.
mattressDescription-family: By checking this box you are ordering your climbing wall including the BLOCKids safety crash pad with anti-slip treatment. Dimension of one crash pad is 78Ã—78 cm, height 7 cm.
mattressDescription-public: By checking this box you are ordering your climbing wall including a large crash pad, which must be used in public spaces in accordance with the EU legislation.
